About me

BIO

Hello! My name is Miro Rahkonen and I currently study at the LUT University of Technology in Lappeenranta. I am planning on being employed at some IT related firm which fixes and/or assembles computers. If that field doesn't suit me as I hoped it would, I plan on continuing education in game development which I am also quite interested in pursuing. For now I'm focusing on graduating with a bachelors in information technology.

Kuopion Lyseo

Education period: 2016 - 2018

I entered Lyseo right after high school and graduated in the planned 3 years after finishing all my baccalaureate exams in spring of 2018. I completed exams for 5 subjects and managed to pass all of them with scores I was satisfied with.

Baccalaureate exams and grade

  • Extended mathematics: E
  • Extended English: E
  • Physics: E
  • Chemistry: E
  • Finnish: C

LUT Lappeenranta University of Technology

Education period: 2019 - Ongoing

I applied to enter LUT in spring of 2018 after graduating from Lyseo in Kuopio. I managed to enter with only my exam scores so I didn't need to do the entrance exam. Though I had to do military service at the end of 2018 so I started University a year later in autumn of 2019. Currently I am planning to graduate with a bachelors in Information Technology in 2024 if all goes as planned.
